property.name: headlineTag
property.label: Headline Tag
property.description: HTML tag used to render the headlines. Any page should only have 1 h1 tag.

property.name: headlineSize
property.label: Headline Size
property.description: Visual size of the headline using the SLDS heading sizes.

property.name: subHeadlineTag
property.label: Sub-Headline Tag
property.description: HTML tag used to render the sub-headlines. Any page should only have 1 h1 tag.

property.name: subHeadlineSize
property.label: Sub-Headline Size
property.description: Visual size of the sub-headline using the SLDS heading sizes.

property.name: backgroundColor
property.label: Background Color
property.description: Enter a hex code

property.name: backgroundImage
property.label: Background Image
property.description: Enter a full image path for a background image. (Optional)

property.name: fixed
property.label: Fixed Background?
property.description: Fix the background image to the background for a scrolling effect

property.name: darkText
property.label: Dark Text (if using a light BG)

property.name: overlayColor
property.label: Overlay Color
property.description: Enter a color in any valid CSS value (HEX, RGBA, RGB, named colors)

property.name: overlayOpacity
property.label: Overlay Opacity
property.description: 0 for transparent, .9 is almost opaque.

property.name: verticalAlignment
property.label: Vertical Alignment
property.description: Vertical alignment of a multi-column arrangement

property.name: container
property.label: Container Width
property.description: Set the max-width of the centered content container

property.name: customClassName

property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.
